name: ams-platform
description: AMS Studio React + FastAPI platform for ITIL ticket analytics

scripts.setup: python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/python -m pip install '.[dev]' && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run backend:8010" "npm run frontend:8010"
